name: My Little SoundCloud (ParallaxMLP)
description: Wanted to have a pony for your SoundCloud logo? Here it is! Have 'Aurella' on your SoundCloud logo! (version 1.4)

user.name: MKody97
user.about: I'm Kody, I live in Switzerland and I enjoy cartoons.

additional_info:
The picture used is from ParallaxMLP on deviantArt, go visit him! Original Picture: http://parallaxmlp.deviantart.com/art/My-Little-SoundCloud-404761632 See the YouTube pony! My Little YouTube See the deviantArt pony! My Little deviantArt
  • Version 1.4: Better support of recent changes (Nov. 2015).
  • Version 1.3: Fix to replace the "Soundcloud" text and fix for size change.
  • Version 1.2: Fixed with recent Soundcloud changes.
  • Version 1.1: Works now with Firefox! Thanks to cloneddragon !
You can see my deviantArt page here: http://mkody.deviantart.com/ Or you can follow me on Twitter (french): @MKody_ Some tags: Bronies, Ponies, Brony, Brony, soundcloud, sc, Parallax, MLP, My Little Pony
